page.title: 18THE HUNT,EARLS COLNE
page.content: The kennels have 90 foxhounds and five horses.The hunters go hunting twice a week. They hunt foxes in the area of Sudbury,Hatfield,Colchester and Haverhill. The amount of people that go hunting are between 50 and 100.On the farm behind the kennels they have one sheep two goats and lots of cows.They have 45 acres of land altogether. The proper name for the kennels is East Essex Foxhound Kennels.The hunt was first started in 1800 it was moved to its presant location in 1930. The hunt kennels are run by Mr and Mrs O Shea.
